document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Maernos Villa (labeled 115) on the corner of the Copper Street and Delzorin Street.
document_data.name: Maernos Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Maernos Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Maernos]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the west section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] at the intersection of [[Delzorin Street]] and [[Copper Street]]. The rear of the villa sat on [[Sidle Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The five buildings that composed the villa compound were three or four stories tall.
